meanings.sent3: The clown's insanenesses made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The insanenesses of the situation were hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The insanenesses of the haunted house scared the visitors.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being insane.
meanings.sent1: The insanenesses of his actions shocked everyone.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't understand the insanenesses of his behavior.
meanings.sent3: The insanenesses of the movie plot kept the audience guessing.
meanings.sent4: The insanenesses of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent5: The insanenesses of the experiment led to unexpected results.
